alert.note: Alert for Hinds; Issaquena; Warren (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 20 at 4:30PM CST until November 20 at 5:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM CST FOR NORTHEASTERN WARREN...NORTHWESTERN HINDS AND SOUTHEASTERN ISSAQUENA COUNTIES... At 429 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Vicksburg, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Vicksburg, Bovina, and Redwood around 435 PM CST. Oak Ridge and Flowers around 440 PM CST. Edwards and Youngton around 445 PM CST. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for northeastern Louisiana. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for central and west central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
